name: Ghost at Dawn (Demo)
description:
WARNING: This game features heavy themes, sensitive issues, violence, and gore. Player discretion is advised. 

Ghost at Dawn is a love letter to classic survival horror games like Resident Evil, Alone in the Dark, and Silent Hill. Inspired by the artistic works of horror masters Junji Ito and Stephen King.

Features:

-Cinematic Fixed Camera Perspectives

-Limited Inventory Management

-Tank Controls

-Disturbing, Macabre Story

-Intense Gun Combat
